fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, Paralyze a player. They can't talk in any chat, can't do actions or vote, do not count towards the vote total, and are effectively dead. However they do not count as dead (for things like Medium and Necromancer).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Paralyzing a player fails if the target was healed that night (paralyzing otherwise ignores defense)
- Paralyzed players can't be revived (because they aren't dead)
- One random player at the start of the game counts as paralyzed for Paralyzer's win condition (but is not paralyzed)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live as the only evil in with a majority Town who is Paralyzed (not killed)
